CustomField.description: Administrators populate this optional text field with the lookup field API name that defines the path from the policy type's context object to the object on which the workflow is initiated. By default, it is blank.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the lookup field API name that defines the path from the policy type's context object to the object on which the workflow is initiated. If the lookup field API name is the same as the context object, leave this field blank.
CustomField.label: Workflow Object
